description:
Helping people face the physical, emotional and financial challenges of suffering injuries due to another's negligence, MetroLaw.Com provides dedicated personal injury services in Newark, New Jersey, as well as on Staten Island, New York. Our law firm recognizes the toll that accidents resulting in injury can have on our clients and their families, and we are committed to helping them achieve financial justice.

After suffering injuries through no fault of their own, people may be weighed down by concerns about mounting medical bills, lost wages and meeting their financial responsibilities while they are recovering. Acting as our clients' advocates, we pursue their rights and best interests in negotiations with negligent parties or their insurance companies and, if necessary, in the courtroom.

Our law firm's lead attorney has more than four decades practicing exclusively in personal injury. We aggressively pursue maximum compensation on behalf of clients in cases involving matters such as car accidents, truck collisions, slip-and-falls, premises liability, animal bites, construction site accidents, medical malpractice, and nursing home abuse and neglect.

At MetroLaw.Com, we recognize that each client, each injury and every case is unique. Our attorneys provide customized guidance and personal attention, developing tailored strategies that account for our clients' specific needs and legal objectives. We emphasize accessibility, working to take calls whenever we are available and to promptly return messages when we are not. To best serve our clients, our law firm offers free initial consultations, and we accept credit cards.
